data.title: History of Breitling
data.description: Explore Breitling’s evolution through its key milestones, from its founding to its modern renaissance.

theories.content:
The perception of a brand is often shaped by only a few key decades.
For Breitling, this is usually the aviation era, especially during the quartz crisis.

But there is much more to discover.
This lesson explores how Breitling evolved over time and built its reputation across different eras.

You’ll learn the milestones that define the brand and how to use them to tell a powerful story.

questions.content_default: What shapes the perception of a brand like Breitling over time?
questions.content_if_TF: The perception of Breitling is shaped mostly by its aviation history during the quartz crisis.
questions.content_if_blank: The perception of Breitling is shaped mostly by its __________ history during the quartz crisis.

data.description: The Breitling Top Time Limited Edition is a modern reinterpretation of an iconic 1960s chronograph, nicknamed the "Zorro" for its bold dial design. Limited to 2,000 pieces, it combines retro styling, COSC-certified performance, and digital innovation with a blockchain-backed passport guaranteeing authenticity.
